summary.span: 表示描述权限和其他适用于具有特定证据集的代码的信息的 的语句。

span.span: Represents the statement of a describing the permissions and other information that apply to code with a particular set of evidence.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由一组已授予的权限和代码组可能的特殊特性组成。A consists of a set of granted permissions, and possible special attributes for the code group. 策略语句通常用作上的操作的返回值 。Policy statements are typically used as the return value of a operation on a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类的成员。 The following code example shows the use of members of the class [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement_Evt/CS/members.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象的哈希代码，此代码适合在哈希算法和数据结构（例如哈希表）中使用。

returns.span: 当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: A hash code for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同一权限的两个实例的哈希代码可能不同，因此，不应使用哈希代码来比较两个 对象。The hash code for two instances of the same permission might be different, hence a hash code should not be used to compare two objects. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法获取当前策略语句的哈希代码。The following code example shows how to use the method to get the hash code for the current policy statement. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
